name: Asus Vivobook X515MA Celeron N4500 15.6 HD Laptop
description: The Toshiba Dynabook Satellite Pro C40-G-109 Celeron 5205U 14 HD Laptop is powered by the Intel Celeron 5205U processor (2M Cache, 1.90 GHz) including UHD graphics, 4GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM, and 128GB M.2 SATA SSD. The laptop comes with a 14 Inch HD (1,366 x 768) 16:9 LED Backlit, Non-reflective Anti-Glare display. This 14 laptop offers all the tools you need for a productive work or study day. It has a large keyboard and large Precision Touch Pad-equipped ClickPad to provide comfort and control throughout the day. The Toshiba  Satellite Pro C40-G-109 is equipped with 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and Gigabit-LAN. The laptop comes with a full-size HDMI port makes big-screen presentations easy, and a microSD card reader lets you access portable storage whenever you need to. It also has a built-in USB Type-C that lets you charge, connect, display and transfer data through a single port. The Toshiba Dynabook Satellite Pro C40-G-109 Laptop comes with 2 years warranty.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i  N4020 256GB SSD 15.6 HD Laptop

key_features.Processor: Intel Celeron N4020 (4M Cache,1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz)

description: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Laptop comes with Intel Celeron N4020 Processor (4M Cache,1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz) and 4GB DDR4 2400Mhz RAM. This laptop comes with 256GB NVMe PCIe SSD. It has been integrated with Intel UHD Graphics 600 and it runs on Windows 11 Home operating system. In this laptop, it has 2 x USB 3.1 (Gen 1)USB 2.0, HDMI 1.4b, Headphone / mic combo, 2 x 1.5W speakers Dolby Audio Ports, Connectors & Slots and Finger Print Sensor.  This laptop is also featured with a 2 Cell Li-Polymer battery, Full-size English (US) keyboard, 720p HD Webcam with Privacy Shutter, and an SD card reader. Here, WiFi 2 x 2, 1 x 1 AC and Bluetooth Version 5.0 Network & Wireless Connectivity are available. The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Laptop offers 03 years Limited Warranty (Terms & Conditions Apply As Per Lenovo).

name: Asus P1511CMA Intel Celeron N4020 15.6-Inch HD Laptop
description: The Asus P1511CMA laptop comes equipped with an Intel Celeron Processor N4020 (4M Cache, 1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz) and 4GB DDR4 RAM. It includes a 1TB SATA 5400RPM 2.5 HDD.This laptop features Intel UHD Graphics 600 and a 15.6-inch HD (1366 x 768) display with a 16:9 aspect ratio. It is powered by the Windows 11 Home operating system. This system is powered by a 37WHrs, 2S1P, 2-cell Li-ion battery and includes a 4.0, 33W AC Adapter with Output: 19V DC, 1.75A, 33W, and Input: 100-240V AC 50/60Hz universal. This laptop includes a VGA webcam and a built-in speaker with SonicMaster technology. Wireless connectivity is provided by the Asus P1511CMA via Wi-Fi 5(802.11ac) and Bluetooth 4.1 (Dual band) 1*1. The laptop has 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, and 2x USB 2.0 Type-A connectors. The Asus P1511CMA Intel Celeron N4020 15.6-Inch HD Laptop comes with 2 years International Limited Warranty (Battery 1 year).

name: Acer Extensa 15 EX215-54-37AH Core i3 11th Gen  Laptop
description: Acer Extensa 15 EX215-54-37AH Laptop comes with Intel Core i3-1115G4 (6M Cache, 3.00 GHz up to 4.10 GHz) and 4GB DDR4 RAM. This laptop also comes with a 1TB 2.5-inch 5400RPM HDD. It has been integrated with Intel UHD Graphics is featured with a 15.6 FHD (1920x1080) Display. The laptop is powered by a 2 Cell Li-Ion 36.70Wh Battery and has an AC power apapter. It has a touchpad with multi-touch gesture support. It also has a microphone, WebCam, Dual speakers. The laptop runs on Free Dos. The laptop features Intel Wireless-AC 9461; IEEE 802.11ac/a/b/g/n, Bluetooth 5.0 for wireless connectivity. The laptop comes with 2 x USB2.0, 1 x USB3.2 Gen 1, 1 x HDMI Port, Headphone Port Combo, Microphone Port Combo. The Acer Extensa 15 EX215-54-37AH laptop has 2 years warranty (01 year Battery & Adapter)..
